One sutra of the sparrow, with mantras. On the third day of the eighth month of the Baoli era, the fifth year of the sexagenary cycle, I, Shamen Wang, was ordered to copy it. Completed at Nanyue's Mount KongΕ.

Shamon HonchΕ, the gate of esotericism, respectfully recorded. On the twenty-third day of the eighth month of the twelfth year of the Tianbao era, the year of the sexagenary cycle, I finished copying it by hand from the newly acquired copy in the Yuan Tong Temple library. This copy differs from the current version of the sutra in many places. It can be compared.
At the end, it is recorded that RyΕsei was forty-three years old.
